mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( id, parent_id, name, identifier, sort, url, target, icon, is_show, permission ) values( SEQ_GENERAL.NEXTVAL, #{parent.id}, #{name}, #{identifier}, #{sort}, #{url}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{isShow}, #{permission} )
mapper.update: update sys_menu set parent_id = #{parent.id}, name = #{name}, identifier = #{identifier}, sort = #{sort}, url = #{url}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_menu where id=#{id} or parent_ids like concat(#{parentIds},',',#{id},'%') and id<>1
mapper.select: select a.id, a.parent_id as "parent.id", a.name, a.identifier, a.sort, a.url, a.target, a.icon, a.is_show, a.permission, p.name as "parent.name" from sys_menu a left join sys_menu p on a.parent_id = p.id where a.id = #{id}
select id, parent_id as "parent.id", name, identifier, sort, url, target, icon, is_show, permission from sys_menu order by sort
select id, parent_id as "parent.id", name, identifier, sort, url, target, icon, is_show, permission from sys_menu where parent_id is null order by sort
select id, parent_id as "parent.id", name, identifier, sort, url, target, icon, is_show, permission from sys_menu where parent_id = #{id} order by sort

select a.id, a.parent_id as "parent.id", a.name, a.identifier, a.sort, a.url, a.target, a.icon, a.is_show, a.permission, p.name as "parent.name" from sys_menu a left join sys_menu p on a.parent_id = p.id where a.identifier = #{identifier}

select a.id, a.parent_id as "parent.id", a.name, a.identifier, a.sort, a.url, a.target, a.icon, a.is_show, a.permission, p.name as "parent.name" from sys_menu a left join sys_menu p on a.parent_id = p.id where a.id <> #{id} START WITH a.ID = #{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR a.PARENT_ID = a.ID

select a.id, a.parent_id as "parent.id", a.name, a.identifier, a.sort, a.url, a.target, a.icon, a.is_show, a.permission, p.name as "parent.name" from sys_menu a left join sys_menu p on a.parent_id = p.id where a.id <> #{id} START WITH a.ID = #{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR a.ID = a.PARENT_ID
